![Photo of Mayor Pro Tem Amy McHenry](https://www.duvallwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=8096 "Photo of Mayor Pro Tem Amy McHenry")

# Amy McHenry

 

[Mayor &amp; City Council](https://www.duvallwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=13)  
Title: Councilmember, Position # 3  
Phone: 425-419-6105  
[Email](mailto:amy.mchenry@duvallwa.gov)

Amy was elected to City Council position #3 in November 2017 and again in 2021 to a four-year term as Councilmember ending December 31, 2025.

Amy served on a nonprofit preschool board for four years, volunteers in the classroom as well as with various PTSA programs and owns a small business in Duvall.

Amy served on the City of Duvall's Tree and Sensitive Area Advisory Group, working to update codes that reflect best available science and the community's vision for Duvall.

Serves on:  
Public Works Committee  
Public Safety Committee  
Human Services Grant Ad-Hoc Committee  
Council Ethics Policy Ad-Hoc Committee  
King Conservation District Advisory Committee representing the Sound Cities Association  
Sound Cities Association - Joint Recommendations Committee

*"I'm honored to serve the citizens of Duvall and welcome your comments, questions and concerns."*

### Contact Us

1. **CITY HALL**
   
   15535 Main Street NE   
   Duvall, WA  98019
   
    
   
   **Main:** 425-788-1185 (Monday through Thursday, 9.00 am through 5.00 pm, and Fridays from 8.00 am through 12.00 pm)
   
   **Lobby Hours:** 9.00 am to 4.00 Monday through Thursday.
   
   Customer Service is available **by appointment** on Friday from 8 am to 12 pm. City Hall is otherwise closed to the public on Fridays.
